subtopics.title: What are Plants?
subtopics.description: Plants are living things that grow in the soil. They can be small like grass or large like trees.

questions.question: What do plants need to grow?

subtopics.title: How Plants Grow
subtopics.description: Plants grow from seeds. With the right amount of water, sunlight, and air, the seed can sprout and grow into a full plant.

questions.question: What comes first when a plant grows?

subtopics.title: Parts of a Plant
subtopics.description: A plant has different parts, like the roots, stem, leaves, and flowers, each with a special job.
